Flow.description: Remove space between Member Portal Origin field

formulas.description: Stores description for case created due to state change on address
formulas.name: AddressChangeDescription
BankDescription
formulas.expression: "Bank Account closed. A " + {!VTBankAccountType} + " account from " + {!vBankName} + " with the Bank Account Number: " + {!vBankAccountNumber} + " has been marked inactive."

formulas.name: MakePreferredEmail
formulas.expression: IF({!Make_this_my_preferred_Email}=TRUE," Please make this my preferred email.","")

formulas.name: MakePreferredPhone
formulas.expression: IF({!Make_this_my_preferred_phone}=TRUE," Please make this my preferred phone.","")

formulas.description: Stores Description field for Name Change Case
formulas.name: NameChangeDescription
formulas.expression: "Request to change name to Salutation:"+ " "+ {!Salutation} + " "+ "First:" + " "+ {!First_Name}+ " "+ "Middle:"+ " "+ {!Middle_Name} +" "+" Last:"+ " " + {!Last_Name} + " "+" Reason for change:"+" "+ {!Name_Change_Reason}

formulas.description: Store description for Phone Change case
formulas.name: PhoneChangeDescription

fields.name: AddressChangeDescriptionNew
fields.fieldText: Please fill out the form below to update your mailing address:

fields.name: VerifyInProgress
fields.fieldText: Address change is unavailable at this time while we review and process your previous address change request. If you need help or have questions, please email our Member Relations team at pfcc1@pensionfund.org.

fields.fieldText: (Changing your preferred email may temporarily impact your access to the Pension Fund Member Portal)

fields.fieldText:

fields.name: Changephoone
fields.fieldText: Please fill out the form below with your new name information:

fields.name: Bank_info_title
fields.fieldText: Enter Bank Information

fields.name: uhsnkjdsbkj
fields.fieldText: Please fill out the form below with your new Email and/or Phone information:

fields.name: Note
fields.fieldText: (If available, a mobile phone is the recommended preferred phone type to be used as your primary contact. This will allow you the option of gaining access to the Member Portal by receiving a security code via text. If you select another phone type as the preferred method, you will receive your security code via phone call.)

fields.name: Thankmessage
fields.fieldText: Thank you for submitting your updated information. Please give the PFCC team 3-5 business days to validate these changes.
